sentences.sContent: Although he failed as a prospector, he succeeded as a journalist.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although he failed as a prospector, he succeeded as a journalist.
sentences.sCn: 他作为采矿者遭遇失败，但作为记者大获成功。

sentences.sContent: The man, of Asian descent, wearing the clothes of a low-level prospector, seemed to be quite intrigued by what was going on inside.
sentences.sContent_eng: The man, of Asian descent, wearing the clothes of a low-level prospector, seemed to be quite intrigued by what was going on inside.
sentences.sCn: 一个亚洲血统的男人，穿着初级勘探者的制服站在窗外，似乎对这里面的情况很感兴趣。

remMethod.val: pro(向前) + spect(看) + or(表人， 名词后缀) → 向前看的人 → 负责向地下探测的人 → 勘探者

trans.tranOther: someone who looks for gold, minerals, oil etc
